amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress regarding climate change.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 99 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 46. Record Vote Number: 15.
Amendment SA 99 proposed by Senator Cantwell for Senator Manchin to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S391, S392-393; text: CR S391) To express the sense of Congress regarding climate change.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 99 proposed by Senator Cantwell for Senator Manchin to Amendment SA 2.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 99 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 46. Record Vote Number: 15.
